titles.title: Go Tell It On The Mountain

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Go tell it on the mountain, newline Over the hills and everywhere; newline Go tell it on the mountain, newline That Jesus Christ is born.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Down in a lowly manger, newline The humble Christ was born; newline And brought us God's salvation, newline That blessed Christmas morn.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When I was a seeker, newline I sought both night and day; newline I asked the Lord to help me, newline And He showed me the way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He made me a watchman, newline Upon the city wall; newline And if I am a Christian, newline I am the least of all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: While shepherds kept their watching, newline O'er silent flocks by night; newline Behold throughout the heavens, newline There shone a holy light.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And lo, when they had seen it, newline They all bowed down and prayed; newline They traveled on together newline To where the Babe was laid.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The shepherds feared and trembled, newline When lo above the earth; newline Rang out the angel chorus, newline That hailed our Savior's birth.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: When I was a sinner, newline I prayed both night and day; newline I asked the Lord to help me, newline And He showed me the way.
